phrases: I walk through the white pages of my storybook
that is just waiting to be painted
with a kaleidoscope of my experiences
tabi suru kaze tsutsumikomu you ni senaka wo osu
and the wind wraps around me and urges me forward
aa yawarakakute atatakai kimi no te
Your hand is so warm held within mine
nigiri shimete sono kokoro no oku made todoku you ni
It reaches all the way into my heart
hohoenmi de kumeta nara nigirikaeshite kuretara
I cannot see a brighter future
boku wa tada mae wo miteru
than you smiling and taking my hand as well
Even though she knows you like Koichi, Misato!
What is so good about Koichi anyway?
I am sure Misato thinks he is cute.
You do not like anyone, Kurumi?
I am so glad I got to become friends with you, Kurumi!
I am so glad we are all friends!
Wait, Miyagawa said he liked Kurumi?
Miki's had a crush on him for so long!
It is because Kurumi's been exchanging notes with him.
She does not like it when guys like someone else besides her.
That is why she always does this!
I cannot believe she calls herself Kurumi when her name is really Ume.
I only became friends with her because all the guys are willing to talk to you once you mention her name.
Hey, when Kurumi gets a crush on someone, we will get in her way, okay?
Since she got in all of ours!
Are you staying after for practice?
Just came to pick something up.
Yeah, I did leave it here.
This boy, who had so many friends...
We are in the same class again!
He always saw me as me.
When I started to like him, I kept my feelings hidden deep down inside of me.
But I have tried really hard to get him to fall for me too.
I have tried harder at that than I have at school.
I went to Kitahoro high school because he did.
We were in different classes, but...
I was told to bring this printout to you, class rep!
Do not they look good together?
I always went to talk to him.
So that maybe one day, he would look at me the same way I look at him.
Yeah, it is a drag, but Kazehaya will be there!
Things always seem more fun with him.
He got elected for sports festival class rep before he knew what hit him!
Yeah, I heard that Kazehaya's class D's rep for the sports festival.
Then you should become our class rep, Kurumi!
This could be your chance, Kurumi!
I told you, it is not like that!
I do not mind being class rep though.
But I cannot just elect myself!
You were picked as a class rep too?
We both got the short stick this time, huh.
Oh right, thanks for the CD earlier too.
There is actually one I would like to borrow from you as well.
I will bring it for you.
There is been a lot of talk about Sadako lately, has not there?
Yeah, everyone is gossiping about her.
I wonder what kind of girl she really is.
She is with Kazehaya a lot, is not she?
Now that you mention it, yeah.
I wonder if they are dating?
I am sure that is not true!
It would not be that weird for Kazehaya to fall for her, right?
Kazehaya's just talking to her because he is a nice guy!
And if he were to fall for someone, it would definitely be you, Kurumi!
It is just because we went to the same middle school.
Why do not you just go out with him?
We are really not like that!
Maybe you do not think so, but what about him?
You are the reason I do things like that.
Kazehaya was changing right before my very eyes.
Yes, because Sawako pushed herself in between us!
I just wanted to talk to Sawako.
We finally got to know each other better recently!
I need to do something about her.
Yeah, lunch time then nap time!
Please meet me behind the sports equipment room at noon.
Things did not work out in the end.
I wonder why it could not have been me.
I have always, always liked him.
I have liked him for much longer than Sawako has.
I wonder what would have happened if I would confessed to him before he met Sawako?
Even though I did my best, it was just impossible.
It was Kazehaya's decision, after all.
Kazehaya and I would not make a good couple, would we?
Then I want you to support us.
You are the only one I have told about this.
Unless you think there is someone better for him.
I think you two would make a great couple.
I would not be able to fully support you from the bottom of my heart.
I am sorry I cannot agree.
I am sorry I cannot help you, but I understand how you feel!
So at least I could listen to you if
Why is not she backing off?
Cannot she feel the difference between us?
That voice is coming from Kurumi's direction.
Is there someone else there behind her?
But it is just so strange.
Do not call me Kurumi anymore.
Your name is going into my book of People Who have Called Me Ume.
Is it okay if I call you that?
Wait, then what should I call you?
Ume is the only thing I hate about myself.
Do not group yourself in with me.
You do not know anything about me.
I have liked Kazehaya since middle school.
I have tried so hard to talk to him, to make sure he did not get a girlfriend...
I know him better than anyone.
This is not some two day crush.
I have always been waiting for him.
Sawako always faces everything and everyone straight on.
She faces me, and Kazehaya, the same way.
I told you, you are annoying!
You have not worked for him at all!
Why do you deserve to be around him all the time?
I thought if it were you my competition, there was no way I could lose!
I like him so, so much more than you do.
I think you are much cuter the way you are now than you were when I first met you.
If Kazehaya does not think so, what does it matter?
I know he does not like me.
I know because I have always been watching him.
I do not want you to see me like this.
Because you know him so well.
Because I thought we could understand each other.
Wait, do you think that Kazehaya possibly likes me?
Kazehaya does not judge people like that.
He is nice and always wants to help people.
He always gives people the benefit of the doubt.
When he laughs, you cannot help but feel better and laugh along with him.
And he is serious when it matters.
He actually has a quick temper, but it is because he cares about doing the right thing!
He is nice to both guys and girls.
Why am I talking to you about this?!
I am so happy we were able to talk like this.
I have never spoken like this to anyone before.
We just entered high school together.
People were finally supportive of us.
If I wanted to make him like me, it was now or never!
No matter what I say now, it will just look like I am denying it out of embarrassment!
I had planned on giving up at that point.
I did not like it when Kazehaya accidentally thought I liked Sanada.
But since it is a misunderstanding, he will understand if you talk to him.
Do you think he would really understand if I told him the truth?
I do not want him to... misunderstand me!
I have always, always liked you, Kazehaya!
I could not possibly like anyone else.
But I have someone I like.
I like her more than anyone else.
But did my confession make you feel happy at all?
Will you call me by my name?
That typical old woman's name is not that bad after all.
I did not want to tell you at all, but I guess not everything goes as planned.
You have no taste in women, Kazehaya!
I cannot believe I told him.
That was not like me at all.
I have not had to use the book of People Who have Called Me Ume.
I wonder if he will accept them from me.
Sawako will definitely make chocolates herself.
Ayane and Chizu probably will not.
I am going with the expensive one!
douka i am about to dake wa furimukanaide
Please do not look at me right now
The sun's set, the wind's blowing,
and we are so close that we can almost touch
My gaze has always been fixed on you
I do not mind if this emotion is what they call love,
and I do not care if I get hurt by it
I just want to tell you, over and over again
I want to give them to him.
